title: Data-Driven Learning Design to Strengthen Hotel Managers' Job Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in hotel management tasks and basic statistical analysis knowledge
context.additional_context: Learners' individual smart device utilization and team project execution based on collaborative tools

learning_goals: Learners can apply regression analysis techniques to solve problems occurring in hotel operational environments.
Learners can establish self-directed learning strategies by analyzing the correlation between risk-taking ability and learning attitudes.
Learners can derive job characteristic factors of hotel management through survey design and data collection processes.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
